--- create_table_cluster_on_delete_no_action.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64,
) primary key (foo),
  interleave in parent foobar
             on delete no action
--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Create: 0,
  Rparen: 50,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 16,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Options:       (*ast.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 47,
        NameEnd: 50,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Dir: "",
    },
  },
  ForeignKeys: []*ast.ForeignKey(nil),
  Cluster:     &ast.Cluster{
    Comma:       51,
    OnDeleteEnd: 115,
    TableName:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 76,
      NameEnd: 82,
      Name:    "foobar",
    },
    OnDelete: "ON DELETE NO ACTION",
  },
  RowDeletionPolicy: (*ast.CreateRowDeletionPolicy)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (foo INT64) PRIMARY KEY (foo), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT foobar ON DELETE NO ACTION
